message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $160?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we say $170?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $165?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we say $172?
I understand you're trying to make a deal, Alice, but $172 is still a bit too high for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $165 again?
I've already offered you a price of $172, and you're coming back to $165? I'm not willing to go back to that price. How about we meet in the middle at $168?
I understand you're trying to hold firm on the price, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with $168. Would you be willing to consider a price of $162?
I'm starting to think we're getting a bit too far apart, Bob. I'm willing to make one last concession. How about we say $169?

I appreciate your willingness to make a last concession, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with $169. I'm going to have to pass on this deal. I think I'll go talk to John and see what he's willing to offer.
